alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades; South Washington Coast; Western Columbia River Gorge; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued August 18 at 4:41PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO NOON PDT MONDAY... The Southwest Clean Air Agency has issued an Air Quality Advisory, which is in effect from 9 AM Saturday to noon PDT Monday. Particulate matter (PM2.5) may intermittently fluctuate between Moderate and Unhealthy For Sensitive Groups. Health Impacts and Recommended Actions: When air quality is Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups, sensitive groups should take steps to reduce exposure. Limit time outside, avoid strenuous outdoor activity, and follow tips for cleaner indoor air. Everyone should watch for symptoms as a sign to reduce exposure. Burning restrictions are in effect. More information about air quality can be found at: www.swcleanair.gov
